alert.note: Alert for Delta; Fannin; Lamar (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 03 at 3:12PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Delta, northwestern Lamar and northeastern Fannin Counties through 345 PM CDT... At 312 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Honey Grove, or 15 miles east of Bonham, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Paris, Honey Grove, Roxton, Dodd City, Sumner, Lake Gibbons, Crockett Lake, Arthur City, Coffee Mill Lake, Camp Maxey, Pat Mayse Lake, Powderly, Lake Crook, Forest Hill, Pecan Gap, Windom, Toco, Telephone, Direct, and Midcity. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
